snippet: A woman from Southern California won a judgment in small claims court against Honda for misrepresenting the fuel economy she could expect from her 2006 Civic Hybrid.
abstract: A woman from Southern California won a judgment in small claims court against Honda for misrepresenting the fuel economy she could expect from her 2006 Civic Hybrid.

headline.main: Citing Overstated M.P.G., Owner of Civic Hybrid Wins Judgment Against Honda
